name: Kekegai Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Yulin Kekegai Coal Industry Limited

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E9%99%95%E8%A5%BF%E5%BB%B6%E9%95%BF%E7%9F%B3%E6%B2%B9%E6%A6%AC%E6%9E%97%E5%8F%AF%E5%8F%AF%E7%9B%96%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Kekegai Coal Mine is a new coal mining project approved in February 2021, located in the Yuyang District of Yulin City, Shaanxi Province

operators: Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Yulin Kekegai Coal Industry Limited
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Yulin Kekegai Coal Industry Limited, which is a subsidiary of Shaanxi Yanchang Petroleum Group.
